about_the_game:
The Rnoos wagon is a four-axle open wagon designed for carrying freshly-cut and sawn timber and similar loads, typically for construction purposes. The Rnoos design represents an improvement over the previous Roos design by incorporating turn-down stanchions which avoid the need to relocate stanchions depending on the load carried.

The ÖBB Rnoos Wagon Pack for TS Marketplace includes the following variants in ÖBB livery:
  • Empty
  • Log load
  • Plywood load
  • Wrapped timber load

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows® 7 / 8.1
  • Processor:Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:40 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics:Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
